summary: a simple bat file to give you every crafting supplies (smithing, alchemy, tanning, smelting, etc)
descriptionHtml:
HHHHUUUUUUUUGGGGEEE thanks to 1100101 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/291131/? 

i like that guy. he's an awesome guy. go endorse a file or two of his (even if he only has one file). what this does is that it does this thing where it just does, bro. that's all i gotta say, man.

things i added: so much sh*t i don't even wanna list it.

hey wait! wtf is wrong with you? y u no upload special bat?

what? i did. cause you know what? ya know what? i added another batch file that -wait for it- ....... removes any excess supplies.

hey wait? wtf is so special about that?

i don't know about you, but this is my average crafting day-

> put all items in nearby barrel

> look nekad an people start commenting on your in-the-buffness (plus if you're a girl, brenuin checks you out, but then again if your dude he'll still check you out)

> batch crafting txt file

> walk slowly to da skyforge

> craft latest skimpy-sexy-why-even-wear-clothes-if-you're-just-gonna-walk-around-like-a-tramp-armor-outfit-thingy

> put that long a55 named armor in barrel that i had previously mentioned if you were paying attention

> i forgot what happens here

> ` player.removeallitems

> take your now counts as stolen equipment because that barrel ain't yours to begin with

> ???

> hehehe i even forgot that step- PROFIT!

well more like failure if you ask me!!11one!

here's the new and improved playthrough with my mod!

> walk to skyforge like a boss

> batch file

> create some kicka55 (full body covering) armor like alduin scale or idk

> batch other file

> ???

> PROFIT, NETCHES!!!

and that's why i don't like your mom.

QA

Q. how da flute do i instell dis?

A. you don't

Q. instructions unclear; batched "removecrafting.txt" before "givecrafting.txt"

A. stop being an idiot

Q. Your description has caused a large quantity of my cells to become cancerous tumors. I abhor you, Sir.

A. thanks. i like it when haters die of the cancer i caused them c:

Q. now you're giving me butthurt

A. like i said before, stop being an idiot. take my bad description as a joke for bucks sakes.

Q. you're trying too hard to make me laugh

A. wait, i'm the one writing the Q's. why did i put that one in here?

Q. okay, we get it already.

A. good. download the stupid mod and shut up.
author: i did it
